data.title: WINE vs OLIVE OIL IN THE CANAVESE AREA Piedmont – Ivrea – Trek & Taste
data.text:
1) The participant to the hike/trek declares under his/her own responsibility to be in good health conditions and to indemnify and hold harmless Sabrina Pastacaldi, Nature Hiking Guide AIGAE LO639, as in charge of organizing the excursion as well as other participants and third parties involved as experts from any civil or penal liability following the verification of his/her health conditions.

2) During the excursion, the participant to the hike/trek commits to behave in accordance with law and civilisation principles and he/she commits to never behave against law and civilisation principles which could endanger his/her own and third parties’ safety.

3) The participant to the hike/trek having parental authority on a minor during the excursion, declares to indemnify and hold harmless Sabrina Pastacaldi, Nature Hiking Guide AIGAE LO639, as in charge of organizing the excursion as well as other participants and third parties involved as experts, from any civil or penal liability or damage to third parties and/or facilities and /or objects following minor’s behaviour.

4) The participant to the hike/trek indemnifies and holds harmless Sabrina Pastacaldi, Nature Hiking Guide AIGAE LO639, as in charge of organizing the excursion from any direct or indirect responsibility for any damage, material or non-material, robberies and losses and/or damage to any personal object and/or spending (including legal expenses) deriving from participating to the excursion, also following his/her own as well as third parties behaviour.

5) Registration to the hike/trek on the website or signing and ticking registration forms involve the participant to the hike/trek assuming any responsibility deriving from the participation to the excursion thus indemnifying and holding harmless Sabrina Pastacaldi, Nature Hiking Guide AIGAE LO639, as in charge of organizing the excursion as well as other participants and third parties involved, from any civil or penal liability, even strict liability, following injuries he/she has caused to himself/herself as well as to third parties during the excursion, including transfers to and from the area of the excursion, by any mean of transport.

6) The participant to the hike/trek declares to comply with safety and behaviour rules and advice given by Sabrina Pastacaldi, Nature Hiking Guide AIGAE LO639, as in charge of organizing the excursion and to take penal or civil liability towards himself/herself or third parties in case of abandonment of the excursion guided by Sabrina, in which case he/she will sign a dedicated form.

7) The participant to the hike/trek commits not to reveal on any means tracks GPS or similar which have been registered during the excursions organized by Sabrina Pastacaldi, Nature Hiking Guide AIGAE LO639, in respect of her job and profession.

8) Hikes and treks are confirmed upon achievement of the minimum number of participants as shown on the detailed programme, where participants are people who have sent the order and paid for the full amount of the accompanying fee.

9) As to pictures and video taken during the excursions and events organised by Sabrina Pastacaldi, Nature Hiking Guide AIGAE LO639, the participant to the hike/trek authorized free of charge and with no time limitations according to arts. 10 and 320 cod. civ. and artt. 96 and 97 law 22.4.1941, n. 633 "Law on copyright", publishing and/or diffusion of his/her images in any form on website, www.trekandtaste.it, and/or on facebook page "Sabrina Pastacaldi Guida Ambientale Escursionistica AIGAE”, and/or on instagramm "Trekandtaste", on paper and/or any other means of diffusion, and also authorizes the keeping of such images and videos in the digital archive kept by Sabrina Pastacaldi, considering that the aim of their use is only promotional.

Cancellation by the Participant

In case of cancellation by the Participant within 3 days before the event, the amount paid will be considered valid as a voucher for a following event.

No refund is due in case of cancellation by the participant after that term. Deposits are not refundable.

Vouchers are valid for 1 year from date of the excursion booked.

In case the Participant decides to interrupt the excursion, the amounts paid (including balance) will not be refunded and the Guide will not be held liable for any claims or damage.

In case of cancellation of a trek including overnight, the refundable amount depends on the cancellation policy of the hotel/lodge/B&B involved.

Cancellation by the Guide

The excursion could be cancelled or postponed due to force majeure and the amounts paid will be refunded except for bank charges and other costs which do not depend on the Guide’s will.

The excursion can be cancelled and/or interrupted anytime at the Guide’s absolute discretion, in case safe and proper conditions cannot be guaranteed (eg in case of sickness and/or injury of one of the Participant, worsening weather conditions…and so on).

Information according to art. 13 of the Italian D. Lg n. 196/2003 completed by Italian D. Lg. 101/2018 in accordance with the European rules as to privacy according to Italian artt. 13 and 14 of the European Rules 2016/679 (GDPR): personal data included in the order submitted online in paper forms, in respect with the rules in force and with the principle of fairness, lawfulness, transparency and confidentiality; in this sense, data provided , including authorized face pictures and videos, will be only treated for structural purposes connected with the activities as described in the rules on the website www.trekandtaste.it and for the issuing of invoices for professional services as required by laws in force. The provision of the consent is optional, but in case of lack of provision of personal data use, the invoice will not be issued and the participant will not be allowed to participate to the excursion. Anytime, it is possible to exercise all the rights quoted in the Italian art. 6 of the D. Lgs. N. 196/2003, completed with D. Lgs. N. 101/2018 in adaptation to the European rule (UE) 2016/679 (GDPR),mainly the cancelation, the rectification or integration of data. Such rights can be exercised by writing to sabrina@trekandtaste.it.
